title: Drawing, "Project for a woven or printed fabric", 1850–80
medium: Blotted black and black crayon, brush and watercolor on paper
markings: Upper center, same stamp as 1925-1-11; reverse, stamp: P. and C. LACOUR / Dessinateurs Industriels / NOUVEAUTES MEUBLES / Impression / 22 Rue Terraile 22 / LYON.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Silhouetted boughs in the style of about 1600 hanging from rising waves. Small flower boughs are shown in intervals. An ovoidal is finished.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a woven or printed fabric", 1850–80.
1850–80. Blotted black and black crayon, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1925-1-231.
